text: Bussy was a municipality of the district Broye in the canton of Fribourg in Switzerland. On 1 January 2017, the former municipalities of Bussy, Estavayer- le-Lac, Morens, Murist, Rueyres-les-Pr√©s, Vernay and Vuissens merged into the new municipality of Estavayer.Historisiertes Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz accessed 5 January 2017 == References == ==Other websites== Category:Former municipalities of Fribourg
title: Bussy, Fribourg
